item.title:
RT by @robbooth: My debut album 'The trees were buzzing, and the grass.' is out today.
It feels like ages ago that I was making this, but it's such a personal record - it was all I thought about for a whole year.
I'm so excited for you to hear it.
https://hth.lnk.to/trees
item.dc:creator: @wordcolour
item.description:
My debut album 'The trees were buzzing, and the grass.' is out today.

It feels like ages ago that I was making this, but it's such a personal record - it was all I thought about for a whole year.

I'm so excited for you to hear it.

hth.lnk.to/trees
